metadata.title: CVE-2020-8017 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A Race Condition Enabling Link Following vulnerability in the cron jobshipped with texlive-filesystem of SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for DesktopApplications 15-SP1, SUSE Linux Enterprise Software Development Kit 12-SP4,SUSE Linux Enterprise Software Development Kit 12-SP5; openSUSE Leap 15.1allows local users in group mktex to delete arbitrary files on the systemThis issue affects: SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Desktop Applications15-SP1 texlive-filesystem versions prior to 2017.135-9.5.1. SUSE LinuxEnterprise Software Development Kit 12-SP4 texlive-filesystem versionsprior to 2013.74-16.5.1. SUSE Linux Enterprise Software Development Kit12-SP5 texlive-filesystem versions prior to 2013.74-16.5.1. openSUSE Leap15.1 texlive-filesystem versions prior to 2017.135-lp151.8.3.1.

criterions.comment: texlive-base: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
